11:17 <iskorptix> hello  
11:37 <iskorptix> how I could prevent from accessing admin panel ?  
11:38 <iskorptix> they can't edit, but they seem have view access, but I can't figure out where this is managed, everything I could find related is already switched off

13:11 <DarkKnightCZ> has joined #xwiki  
13:15 <iskorptix> can anyone help me with permissions please, I got a group, lets called it groupA and problem is that once I remove Program right for it (V icon), everybody in that group looses access to search within wiki and right to delete pages, so what I want to achieve, I want users in groupA would be able to access search, but not allowed to delete any pages (especially those which exist in wiki right now), is  
13:15 <iskorptix> there a way how I could achieve this ? Maybe there is a way how I could extend permissions?
